snippet: A local Guangzhou reported that a worker had started the fire as part of a pay dispute, but there was no government confirmation of that.
abstract: Fire at garment factory in Guangdong Province, China, kills 14 people.
lead_paragraph: A local Guangzhou reported that a worker had started the fire as part of a pay dispute, but there was no government confirmation of that.

headline.seo: Chinese Lingerie Factory Fire Kills 14 in Guangdong
headline.main: Chinese Garment Factory Fire Kills 14 in Guangdong
headline.print_headline: China: Garment Factory Fire Kills 14 in Guangdong
